rule: Inside each paragraph, there must not be any <em> tags to emphasize key words and phrases.
input: Dawn breaks. Day progresses. Dusk sets.
validityText:
The input consists of three sentences, which complies with the specification that requires the paragraph to contain at least three sentences. However, there is no indication of words or phrases that are emphasized using `<strong>` and `<em>` tags, which is a feature mentioned in the specification but not stated as a mandatory requirement. Thus, based on the specification, the input satisfies the requirement of having a minimum of three sentences and does not violate any mandatory requirements regarding emphasized text.

OK
